Hervorzuheben ist der aufmerksame und √ºberaus freundliche Service. Das Team ist herzlich, zuvorkommend und ber√§t bei der Auswahl der Speisen sowie beim gew√ºnschten Sch√§rfegrad kompetent.

Ein kleiner Tipp f√ºr alle, die gerne scharf essen: Bei f√ºnf w√§hlbaren Sch√§rfegraden habe ich mich vorsichtshalber f√ºr Stufe 2 (‚Äûnormal‚Äú) entschieden ‚Äì r√ºckblickend h√§tte es gerne etwas mehr sein d√ºrfen. Wer also gerne w√ºrzig isst, kann ruhig mindestens ‚Äûscharf‚Äú bestellen.

(Translated by Google)
Anyone looking for Indian cuisine in a stylish setting will definitely find what they're looking for at Goa. The food is simply delicious ‚Äì full of flavor, freshly prepared, and lovingly presented.

The attentive and extremely friendly service is particularly noteworthy. The team is warm and courteous, and provides expert advice on the selection of dishes and the desired level of spiciness.

The ambiance is modern and tasteful. The dining room isn't particularly large, which can lead to a bit more noise when the place is full.

A little tip for those who like spicy food: With five selectable spice levels, I opted for level 2 ("normal") as a precaution ‚Äì in retrospect, I would have liked it to be a bit more. So if you like spicy food, feel free to order at least "spicy."

All in all, a thoroughly enjoyable evening. We'll definitely be back ‚Äì with a big appetite and perhaps a little more spice.

reviews.comment:
Leider entt√§uschend trotz gutem Essen.

Ich war heute zum zweiten Mal als Einzelperson bei GOA. Das Essen war wieder gro√üartig ‚Äì leider konnte ich es kaum genie√üen. Mein Platz lag im Zug der ge√∂ffneten T√ºr, es war windig und k√ºhl. Da ich sehr empfindlich auf Zugluft reagiere, habe ich das mehrfach angesprochen. Eine L√∂sung wurde aber nicht gefunden ‚Äì die T√ºr blieb offen, und ein freier, gesch√ºtzter Platz wurde mir verweigert mit dem Hinweis auf eine angebliche gr√∂√üere Reservierung ab 20 Uhr, bei der mehrere Tische zusammengeschoben werden sollten. Um 20:15 sa√üen genau dort dann aber pl√∂tzlich wieder neue Zweierg√§ste (!).

Ich f√ºhlte mich nicht ernst genommen, habe schnell gegessen und bin gegangen. Beim Bezahlen habe ich es nochmal angesprochen, und auch wenn die Kassiererin davon nichts mitbekommen hatte, gab es diesmal kein Trinkgeld.
Sehr schade, denn gutes Essen allein macht noch kein besonderes Restauranterlebnis aus, bei dem flexibel auf Kundenw√ºnsche reagiert wird.

(Translated by Google)
Unfortunately, disappointing despite the good food.

I visited GOA today for the second time as a single diner. The food was great again ‚Äì unfortunately, I could barely enjoy it. My seat was in the draft from the open door; it was windy and chilly. Since I'm very sensitive to drafts, I mentioned it several times. However, no solution was found ‚Äì the door remained open, and I was denied a free, sheltered seat, citing an alleged larger reservation starting at 8 p.m., for which several tables were to be pushed together. At 8:15 p.m., however, new two-person guests (!) suddenly sat right there.

I didn't feel taken seriously, ate quickly, and left. I mentioned it again when paying, and even though the cashier hadn't noticed, there was no tip this time.
It's a shame, because good food alone doesn't make for a special restaurant experience where customers' requests are responsive.

reviews.comment: Tasty supper & attentive service, but I should have ordered something with a little more excitement. The chicken korma was a velvety sweet sauce, instead of a long cooked broken down stew filled with coconut and almond pulp. Having worked in an Indian restaurant, I'm familiar with the process of the cooking; this is the quick version  without body, seasoning, cilantro or citrus. However, the sarti spritz drink was superb with the dish, and the side of chili sauce did offer a powerful punch. I would consider this place wonderful to enjoy with friends and drinks, offering an introductory taste of India.

reviewReply.comment:

We appreciate your perspective, especially given your background in Indian cuisine, and we‚Äôll certainly take your notes about the Chicken Korma to heart. Our aim is always to find the right balance between approachability and authenticity, and your insights help us improve that balance.

We‚Äôd love to welcome you again ‚Äî perhaps next time with a bolder dish that aligns more closely with your tastes.

reviews.comment:
Ambiente & Lage
Wir sa√üen drau√üen auf der Terrasse ist. Etwas laut durch den Verkehr.

Service
Der Service war insgesamt eher wortkarg und nicht besonders aufmerksam. Hier sollte das Personal definitiv an Freundlichkeit und Serviceorientierung arbeiten.

Essen
Die Speisekarte bietet eine gelungene Auswahl klassischer und moderner indischer Gerichte.  Die Aromen waren ausgewogen, Gew√ºrze perfekt abgestimmt ‚Äì hier zeigt sich echte Kochkunst. Auch die vegetarischen Optionen sind abwechslungsreich und kreativ zubereitet.

Preise
Hamburg-typisch sind die Preise im Goa etwas h√∂her angesetzt als in kleineren St√§dten. Ein Hauptgericht liegt im Schnitt bei 18‚Äì25‚Ç¨, eine Vorspeise bei 7‚Äì15 Euro. F√ºr die Qualit√§t und Frische der Speisen ist das Preis-Leistungs-Verh√§ltnis jedoch noch fair.

Fazit
Trotz des etwas unaufmerksamen, wortkargen Services lohnt sich ein Besuch im Goa wegen der hervorragenden K√ºche  Wer authentisch-indische K√ºche in angenehmer Atmosph√§re sucht und bereit ist, f√ºr Qualit√§t etwas mehr zu zahlen, wird hier gl√ºcklich. Wir kommen gerne wieder ‚Äì in der Hoffnung auf einen freundlicheren Service.

(Translated by Google)
Ambiance & location
We sat outside on the patio. A bit noisy due to the traffic.

service
Overall, the service was rather taciturn and not particularly attentive. The staff here should definitely work on friendliness and service orientation.

Eat
The menu offers a successful selection of classic and modern Indian dishes.  The flavors were balanced, the spices perfectly balanced - this is where real culinary art shows itself. The vegetarian options are also varied and creatively prepared.

Prices
As is typical for Hamburg, prices in Goa are slightly higher than in smaller cities. A main course costs on average 18-25 euros, a starter 7-15 euros. However, for the quality and freshness of the food, the price-performance ratio is still fair.

Conclusion
Despite the somewhat inattentive, taciturn service, a visit to Goa is worth it because of the excellent cuisine. Anyone looking for authentic Indian cuisine in a pleasant atmosphere and willing to pay a little more for quality will be happy here. We'd love to come back - hoping for friendlier service.

reviews.comment: Goa in Hafencity, Hamburg, offers a warm, cozy ambiance with excellent service and authentic Indian cuisine. The Goa Mix Tikka was a standout, and the Fish & Chips impressed with its fresh, well-cooked fish, while the Chicken Tikka Masala and Garlic Naan were satisfying and flavorful. The cocktails were also a highlight‚Äîwell-crafted, balanced, and a perfect complement to the meal. With reasonable prices, attentive staff, and a strong drink selection, Goa is a fantastic spot for quality Indian food in Hamburg.

reviews.comment:
Goa ‚Äì ein hei√üer Tipp mit kleinen T√ºcken

Wir wagten uns ins Goa rein,
das Ambiente ‚Äì echt ganz fein.
Doch viele Tische, eng gestellt,
da f√ºhlt man sich fast eingeengt.

Der Vorspeisenteller? Ganz okay,
doch das H√§hnchen ‚Äì oh weh, oh weh!
Ein Nugget-Ding, gepresst, ganz platt,
was mit echtem Fleisch nichts zu tun hat.

Das Chicken Kebab ‚Äì mir zu scharf,
doch lecker, wenn man‚Äôs feurig darf.
Die Garnelen leider etwas trocken,
wohl zu lange im Topf hocken.

Das Masala dann ein Hochgenuss,
hier stimmte endlich der Fleischgenuss!
Doch ach, die Preise ‚Äì ziemlich wild,
besonders, wenn man sich 'n Drink dazuholt.

Trotz kleiner M√§ngel, nichts vergeigt,
ein Wiederkommen ist nicht ausgeschlossen ‚Äì vielleicht!

(Translated by Google)
Goa ‚Äì a hot tip with a few pitfalls

We ventured into Goa,
the ambiance ‚Äì really nice.
But the many tables, spaced so close together,
you almost feel cramped.

The appetizer plate? Okay,
but the chicken ‚Äì oh dear, oh dear!
A nugget-like thing, pressed, completely flat,
which has nothing to do with real meat.

The chicken kebab ‚Äì too spicy for me,
but delicious if you like it spicy.
The shrimp were unfortunately a bit dry,
probably sitting in the pot too long.

The masala was a real treat,
here, the meat finally tasted right!
But oh, the prices ‚Äì pretty wild,
especially if you get a drink with it.

Despite minor flaws, nothing was amiss,
a return is not out of the question ‚Äì maybe!

Sehr gutes Restaurant mit sehr leckerem Essen und richtig netten Kellnern.
Als das Essen kam dachten wir erst, die Portionen sind bisschen klein. Wir haben uns get√§uscht, die Portionen waren genau richtig und gut s√§ttigend. Geschmacklich top, ich hab hier seit langem mal wieder richtig gut indisch gegessen. Was auch gut ist, es gibt drei verschiedene Sch√§rfestufen, die man sich zum bestellten Essen aussuchen kann.

Die Kellner waren sehr nett und h√∂flich. Sie hatten immer ein L√§cheln im Gesicht und waren jederzeit ansprechbar. Einziges Manko war, das Essen kam erst nach 35-40 Minuten nach der Bestellung. Aber das ist Meckern auf hohem Niveau, denn das Restaurant war gut besucht.

Very good restaurant with very tasty food and really nice waiters.
When the food came we first thought the portions were a bit small. We were wrong, the portions were just right and filling. The waiters were very nice and polite. They always had a smile on their faces and were approachable at any time. The only drawback was that the food only came 35-40 minutes after ordering. But that's complaining at a high level, because the restaurant was well attended.

The ambience is also nice. Cozy and stylishly furnished. Neither too rustic nor too chic. The staff make everyone feel welcome.

Unsere S√∂hne hatten ein St√ºck Knorpel/Knochen am H√§hnchen im Chicken Tikka Masala (kann auch mal vorkommen, ist aber f√ºr uns das erste Mal), ein anderes sehr gro√ües St√ºck H√§hnchen war nicht ganz durch. Good Indian food in a great, modern atmosphere with a view of the Elbphi.

We definitely know more authentic Indian food in Hamburg, if you are in HafenCity and fancy Indian food it is an option.

Wir waren schon einmal im Restaurant in Blankenese und wollten dieses Mal das Restaurant in der Hafencity ausprobieren. Das Ambiente ist sehr ansprechend und modern und hat uns richtig gut gefallen. Die Kellnerin fanden wir leider sehr forsch und ziemlich direkt. Dadurch f√ºhlten wir uns ziemlich unter Druck gesetzt, schnell etwas bestellen zu m√ºssen. Die anderen Servicemitarbeiter waren aber sehr zuvorkommend und freundlich. Das Essen hat dann aber super lecker geschmeckt und wir k√∂nnen f√ºr das Essen auf jeden Fall eine Empfehlung aussprechen. Beim bezahlen wurde leider ein zu hoher Betrag auf dem EC Ger√§t eingegeben, was ich allerdings erst zuhause bemerkt habe. Das wird aber bestimmt ein Missverst√§ndnis sein. We've been to the restaurant in Blankenese before and this time we wanted to try the restaurant in Hafencity. The atmosphere is very attractive and modern and we really liked it. Unfortunately we found the waitress to be very brisk and quite direct. This made us feel quite pressured to order something quickly. The other service staff were very courteous and friendly. The food order was taken quickly, but we then had to wait about 50 minutes for our curries, which we found to be quite long. The food tasted really delicious and we can definitely recommend it. Das Ambiente ist frisch und modern gestaltet, sodass man trotz der relativ √ºberschaubaren Gr√∂√üe des Ladens kein beengtes Gef√ºhl hat. An dieser Stelle auch die Empfehlung abends lieber zu reservieren, da es recht gut besucht war.
Die Auswahl ist zwar nicht riesig, aber reichlich und abwechslungsreich. Es gibt durchaus klassische Noten und Gerichte, wie man sie bei einem Inder erwartet, aber gleichzeitig auch einen modernen Touch. Man k√∂nnte es vielleicht sogar als Fusion-K√ºche bezeichnen. Wir haben verschiedene Gerichte bestellt und alle waren k√∂stlich und geschmacklich √ºberraschend, durchweg zum positiven. Das Personal war ebenfalls freundlich. (Translated by Google)
The ambience is fresh and modern, so you don't feel cramped despite the relatively small size of the store. At this point we also recommend making a reservation in the evening as it was quite busy.
The selection is not huge, but plentiful and varied. There are certainly classic notes and dishes that you would expect from an Indian, but at the same time there is also a modern touch. You could perhaps even call it fusion cuisine. We ordered different dishes and all of them were delicious and surprisingly tasty, all positive. The staff was also friendly. If you're not looking for the classic "fat Indian" and are open to a few new flavors, you'll love it here. Clear recommendation, I'll be back!

Der Fusion-Untertitel des Restaurants verbietet nat√ºrlich Kritik hinsichtlich erw√ºnschter Authentizit√§t und beim S√º√ü-Sauer-Blumenkohl funktionierte das f√ºr uns auch super, beim Korma auch, Bhalti und Dal allerdings waren nicht so unser Geschmack und das Tikka nahe an versalzen. We made a reservation for 5 p.m. on a Saturday (highly recommended) and chose the Thali Classic for two. The restaurant's fusion subtitle, of course, prohibits criticism regarding the desired authenticity, and the sweet and sour cauliflower worked perfectly for us, as did the korma. However, the bhalti and dal weren't quite to our taste, and the tikka was almost too salty. The naan was tasty, but quite flat. The portion was absolutely sufficient for two, although we ordered another naan.

The restaurant is in high demand in the chic, new Speicherstadt district. Overall, it's worth a try.

√úberwiegend waren wir mit den Speisen zufrieden. Sehr gut war die Vorspeise Non Veg Mix Pakora, je zwei H√§hnchenbrustfilets, gebackenes Gem√ºse und Garnelen, kann man sich sehr gut teilen! Four of us visited the restaurant for a birthday. The entire team, including the chef, was really friendly and made a real effort. Luckily, a table for four was reserved and confirmed online!...with a mention of a birthday. Unfortunately, the reservation got lost, which is really annoying! At least they managed to push two tables together, but it felt very makeshift, with different chairs, etc., and no special decorations. It's a shame; that's not how you imagine a birthday dinner with friends.
For the most part, we were satisfied with the food. The starter, Non-Veg Mix Pakora, was very good: two chicken breast fillets, baked vegetables, and shrimp; it was great for sharing! The starter, fried chicken bites in pastry with onions, was pure sugar for our taste, but with a good amount of spice. The various main courses were well-seasoned (you can adjust the spiciness yourself) and quite tasty; the naan was also good.
The wines by the glass didn't impress us, neither the white nor the ros√©, and they were somehow too sweet or fruity. Later, we had a house shot, a very sweet piece of cake, and a tabletop firework display after the birthday party was mentioned üòú.
Overall, it was a lovely evening; we had fun, and the lovely team did a great job üëç.
